TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AddingNewEventHandler(object sender, AddingNewEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AddingNewEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AddingNewEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AddingNewEventArgs)
public delegate void AddingNewEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AddingNewEventArgs ^ e);
type AddingNewEventHandler = delegate of obj * AddingNewEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的來源，通常為資料容器或資料繫結集合。

span.span: The source of the event, typically a data container or data-bound collection.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生之前將新的項目加入至集合，通常是在資料繫結案例。The event occurs prior to adding a new item to a collection, typically in data-binding scenarios. 此事件處理常式可以提供要加入新項目覆寫集合類別的標準動作。The handler of this event can supply the new item to be added, overriding the standard action of the collection class. 這可以藉由設定的屬性參數`e`這個新的項目。This is accomplished by setting the property of the parameter `e` to this new item. 通常所收件者的集合，預期的類型必須是此項目或集合將會擲回例外狀況型別的。Typically this item must be of a type expected by the recipient collection, or the collection will throw an exception of type . 此事件常用的類別內的資料繫結案例，例如和。This event is commonly used in data-binding scenarios, within classes such as and . 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用委派，以便處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the delegate to handle the event. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Forms BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]
